snippet: The deal with private sector lenders clears the way for the release of bailout money from Europe and the International Monetary Fund that will save the Greece from imminent default, reports Landon Thomas Jr. for The New York Times.
abstract: The deal with private sector lenders clears the way for the release of bailout money from Europe and the International Monetary Fund that will save the Greece from imminent default, reports Landon Thomas Jr. for The New York Times.

headline.main: Greek Debt Is Restructured in Deal With Lenders
